lexicalizations.lex: Gus Poyet played for Chelsea F.C. and was the manager for AEK Athens FC but he is now in the Real Zaragoza club.
AEK Athens F.C. manager is Gus Poyet whose club is Real Zaragoza, having previously played for Chelsea F.C.
AEK Athens are managed by Gus Poyet who is associated with the Real Zaragoza, a football club and played for Chelsea F.C.
The manager of A.S. Roma is Luciano Spalletti who used to play for Udinese Calcio but now plays for Empoli FC.
Luciano Spalletti played for Udinese Calcio and now manages A.S. Roma and plays for Empoli F.C.
Luciano Spalletti plays for Udinese Calcio and Empoli F.C. as well as managing A.S. Roma.
